snippet: A new study found that for women in romantic relationships, each extra hour of sleep corresponded to higher levels of sexual desire and an increase in the likelihood of sexual activity the next day.
abstract: A new study found that for women in romantic relationships, each extra hour of sleep corresponded to higher levels of sexual desire and an increase in the likelihood of sexual activity the next day.

headline.main: Better Sleep for a Better Sex Life
headline.print_headline: Patterns: More Sleep May Improve Sex
